kpis.atmIv: Annualized IV for near-the-money options; DVOL(30D) used as proxy.
kpis.ivr: Percentile of IV over a 52-week window; high = rich implied vol.
kpis.termStructure: Shape/slope of IV across expiries (contango/backwardation and steepness).
kpis.skew25dRr: 25Δ call IV minus 25Δ put IV; positive = call-heavy skew.
kpis.volOfVol: Volatility of implied vol itself; gauges instability of IV levels.
kpis.tsKink: 0DTE IV minus mean(1–3DTE) IV; same-day premium signal.
kpis.rv: Historical (realized) volatility over the selected window, annualized.
kpis.ivRvSpread: IV minus RV; positive suggests an implied volatility risk premium.
kpis.emHitRate: Share of periods where spot stayed within the expected-move band.
kpis.timeToFirstBreach: Average time (as % of trade life) until spot first breaches the expected-move band within the horizon.
kpis.rvEmFactor: RV divided by expected-move-implied volatility; >1 = EM underpriced.
kpis.shortHorizonAtr: Short-horizon realized σ / intraday ATR normalized vs expected move.
kpis.emRibbon: Recent expected-move bands vs closes; quick read of over/under moves.
kpis.vix: Level of the S&P 500 implied volatility index (VIX); daily close sourced from FRED (series VIXCLS).
kpis.vvix: Vol of VIX (VVIX); gauges instability of index vol.
kpis.vixVvix: Joint regime of VIX and VVIX; high-high = systemic stress.
kpis.crossAssetVol: Cross-asset vol benchmarks (MOVE, credit indices, etc.).
kpis.impliedCorr: Implied correlation from index vs constituents; low = dispersion regime.
kpis.macroEvents: Upcoming macro events (Fed, ECB, CPI, NFP, etc.) that may affect vol.
kpis.eventCollapse: Change in event premium before/after macro events.
kpis.basis: Spot–perpetual basis (annualized), measured vs fair value.
kpis.gammaWalls: Strikes with locally high gamma that can pin or accelerate price.
kpis.liquidityStress: Liquidity stress proxy using spreads, depth and quote stability.
kpis.orderbookHealth: Slope and stability of the order book near best bid/ask.
kpis.condorCreditEm: Condor credit as a % of expected move (EM).
kpis.maxlossCredit: Maximum loss divided by credit received for defined-risk structures.
kpis.pnlVsCredit: Realized PnL relative to initial credit for short-premium structures.
kpis.gammaCenterOfMass: Gamma center of mass strike vs spot within a chosen DTE bucket (e.g. 7–45D); main KPI is distance in %, showing where the global gamma 'weight' sits relative to spot.
kpis.gammaTheta: Gamma exposure scaled by theta; risk of large intraday moves.
kpis.rvEm: Realized volatility relative to expected-move implied volatility.
kpis.boxSpread: Spread between synthetic and cash positions via box trades.
kpis.boxFinancingSpread: Box financing spread vs cost-of-capital benchmarks.
kpis.exDivEarlyEx: Risk around ex-dividend and early exercise for calls/puts.
kpis.fillRatio: Share of targeted orders that were filled vs submitted.
kpis.makerTaker: Maker/taker fee and rebate structure impact on realized costs.
kpis.slippage: Arrival-price vs fill-price deviation, measured in basis points.
kpis.leggingRisk: Realized risk/cost from legging multi-leg structures.
kpis.timeToFill: Time-to-fill statistics, including reprices and partials.
kpis.breakage: Failed/cancelled orders leading to opportunity loss.
kpis.feesSpread: All-in fees plus realized spread paid.
kpis.lockedVsRealized: Captured edge at fill vs ultimately realized edge.
kpis.stressTests: Portfolio PnL under spot shocks and liquidity haircuts.
kpis.capitalUtilization: Margin usage footprint vs limits (Reg-T / PM).
kpis.concentrationLimits: Exposure by underlying/tenor vs concentration caps.
kpis.utilizationVsCaps: Daily/expiry risk utilization vs defined caps.
kpis.dataFreshness: Book/update staleness; data freshness for decisions.
kpis.uptime: Automation uptime and safety/kill-switch trigger counts.
kpis.spotVsSma: Spot distance vs 20/50/100/200D simple moving averages; >0% = above SMA.
